info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 6:21PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Pondera, southwestern Liberty, southeastern Glacier and southern Toole Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 621 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Valier to 13 miles northeast of Brady. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shelby, Kevin, Ethridge, Oilmont, Ledger, Ferdig, Devon, Dunkirk and Galata. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 343 and 384. Highway 2 between mile markers 267 and 307. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for north central Montana.
